reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress sexy and flattering on all body types, with good fabric that's breathable and flowy. They appreciate its comfort, noting it's not scratchy at all, and consider it a perfect Sunday dress. The fit and length receive mixed feedback - while some say it's nice, others find it runs very large, and while some like the length, others say it's a little short. The revealing aspect also gets mixed reviews, with some saying it hides the belly well while others find it completely see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile dress!
items.body: I bought an XL to wear to my graduation. Normally I do wear an XL — I am 5’8 220 — however I could have probably worn a L. I have this in another color in a L actually! I would say the sizing runs a little large, but very comfortable and adjustable due to the waist ribbon. Another thing to note is it is quite short, especially if you carry more weight on your lower half. There is no bending over in this dress! Otherwise it is very cute and very nice quality material. I have worn it many times besides the one event. It’s very versatile, you can easily dress it up and down! Read more
items.author: Evelynne Metzler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wedding guest dress
items.body: Very cute dress! Fit as expected too. I will say, as a well endowed girly that is a little self-conscious of the girls being on display but they were held well and I never felt like I was going to fall out. I was super comfortable on the dance floor of the wedding and while sitting for the 2 hour plated dinner and speeches. It is not a thick material but perfect for the summer nights where it might get a little chilly. I am 180ish, 5' 3", D cup, traditionally a L and I think the L fit well. Read more
items.author: Savannah

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Cute Dress but Fit Was a bit Off for me.
items.body: This dress was very cute and the color was beautiful! The material felt nice and it fit great everywhere except the chest, which was a bit too loose for me. I really loved the overall style, but I ended up returning it. The return process was super easy and my refund came through quickly — great customer service! Read more
items.author: vonnie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and beautiful
items.body: Great comfy material. Easy to adjust to fit my body. It was a little long for my height but I pulled it up and the top was a little big but I pinned the neck drop and shoulders. Could have gotten a size smaller but honestly this size allowed for the adjustments and to still feel comfortable. I actually have a black too! This is a perfect style for my square shape as it creates a waistline. Read more
items.author: Desiree25

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Order next size up.
items.body: It's a pretty dress but runs small in the chest area. I couldn't zip it up. Returning then ordering a bigger size. Ordered in my regular size based on the reviews Read more
items.author: Chef C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for ALL occasions
items.body: Wore this as my wedding dress for my courthouse wedding!! It was perfect and paired with my sneakers very well! Everyone loved it. It’s really short but I’m ONLY 5’3” so it wasn’t an issue for me. I also own this dress in 2 other colors, green and the camel color. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and hides the tummy
items.body: Received quickly and within the quoted time. 5'3, 175lbs, 42 DD, & mommy pouch. It was packaged well and did not have any odd factory smell. The fabric is light weight and not cheaply made. It is of good quality and has a slight stretch. I like a more snug fit which is why I wanted to try both Medium & Large. The style of arms and lower part of the dress were flattering on both the medium and large. The medium fit well on my arms and It covered the mommy pouch. The medium is a more snug fit on my breast for obvious reasons. I personally did not want my breast to be lifted out of the dress so I tried the large. It was a much better fit however, it still did not work for me. It was my personal preference to not wear the dress because I wanted to dress on the modest side. It is a beautiful dress and I would still recommend it. I would say that this dress is true to size. Read more
items.author: Natalie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flattering
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Love this dress! Very flattering and I felt great for my girls night out. Tempted to get more colors. I’m 5’2” and around 155ish lbs. I ordered a Medium and it fits perfectly. Keep in mind if you are small chested make sure you have a cami for underneath or everything will be on display. Deducted one start cause my zipper is having issues. Read more
items.author: Taylor Brill

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gray, Y_geometry and Leaf, Z_19 Bk, Burgundy, Z_21 Burgundy, Z_25 Army Green, Army Green, Black, Camel, Z_28 Light Purple, Z_22 Dark Green, Dark Green, Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
